players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Bob: "Alice, you are the mafia. I know it. Vote for you."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia because he accused Alice."
Bob: "Alice, you are the mafia. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote for you. Diana, please vote for Alice."
